flawed_nl_solution:
He had 80-20=<<80-20=60>>60 after the donation
He kept 60/2=<<60/2=30.0>>30.0 after giving half to his brother
So he has 30.0*3=<<30.0*3=90.0>>90.0 coins
He then does 1 more donation and has 90.0-10=<<90.0-10=81.0>>81.0 coins left

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 80.0, not 81.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
